SEARCH
Package BusinessLayer

Class InventoryFromFile

java.lang.Object
BusinessLayer.InventoryFromFile
public class InventoryFromFile extends Object
The InventoryFromFile class is responsible for loading categories and products from CSV files, associating products with categories, and providing methods to list and display information about categories and products.

    • main

    • loadCategoriesFromCsv

      public static List<Category> loadCategoriesFromCsv(String filePath)
      Load categories from a CSV file and populate the category list.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path of the CSV containing category information.
      Returns:
      A list of Category objects loaded from the CSV file.

    • loadProductsFromCsv

      public static List<Product> loadProductsFromCsv(String filePath, List<Category> categories)
      Load products from a CSV file, associate them with categories, and populate the product list.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path of the CSV containing product information.
      categories - The list of categories to associate with the loaded products.
      Returns:
      A list of Product objects loaded from the CSV file.

    • findCategoryByCode

      public static Category findCategoryByCode(List<Category> categories, int code)
      Find a category by its code in the provided list of categories.
      Parameters:
      categories - The list of categories to search.
      code - The code of the category to find.
      Returns:
      The Category object with the specified code, or null if not found.

    • linkCategories

      public static void linkCategories(List<Category> categories)
      Link categories based on parent codes to establish hierarchical relationships.
      Parameters:
      categories - The list of categories to link.

    • displayData

      public static void displayData(List<Category> categories, List<Product> products)
      Display information about categories and products in the console.
      Parameters:
      categories - The list of categories to display.
      products - The list of products to display.

    • listProductsInCategoryCode

      public static List<Product> listProductsInCategoryCode(List<Category> categories, int categoryCode)
      List all products in the specified category code, including products in subcategories.
      Parameters:
      categories - The list of categories containing the target category.
      categoryCode - The code of the target category.
      Returns:
      A list of Product objects in the specified category and its subcategories.

    • listProductsInThisCategoryCode

      public static List<Product> listProductsInThisCategoryCode(List<Category> categories, int categoryCode)
      List products only in the specified category code, excluding products in subcategories.
      Parameters:
      categories - The list of categories containing the target category.
      categoryCode - The code of the target category.
      Returns:
      A list of Product objects in the specified category only.

    • getAllProductsInCategory

      public static void getAllProductsInCategory(Category category, List<Product> productsInCategory)
      Recursively get all products in the specified category and its subcategories.
      Parameters:
      category - The target category.
      productsInCategory - A list to store products in the category and its subcategories.

    • getAllProductsInthisCategory

      public static void getAllProductsInthisCategory(Category category, List<Product> productsInCategory)
      Get all products only in the specified category, excluding products in subcategories.
      Parameters:
      category - The target category.
      productsInCategory - A list to store products only in the specified category.
